Name: select_feature
Description: 1 if a feature is selected for implementation

Name: select_user_story
Description: 1 if a user story is included in the sprint

Name: select_task
Description: 1 if a task is included in the sprint plan

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: 1 if a worker is assigned to a team

Name: max_parallel_tasks
Description: Cap on concurrent tasks in progress

Name: velocity_target
Description: Target average story points per sprint

Name: sprint_goal_weight
Description: Weight given to sprint goal achievement
